name: kite
description: Python programming copilot â€” Kite shows cloud-powered completions, documentation, and examples.

showKiteTourOnStartup.title: Show Kite Tour On Startup
showKiteTourOnStartup.description: Whether to display the Kite tour on startup.

enableCompletions.title: Enable Completions
enableCompletions.description: Show auto-completions from Kite as Atom suggestions

enableHoverUI.title: Enable Hover UI
enableHoverUI.description: Show hover informations when placing the mouse over a symbol

sidebarPosition.description: Defines where to place the sidebar in the Atom UI.

sidebarWidth.description: Defines the width of the sidebar. When the sidebar is displayed using the new dock API this value will serve as the preferred width.

openSidebarOnStartup.description: Makes the sidebar appears on startup when enabled.

hideDocumentationWhenSignatureIsAvailabl.description: If both a signature and documentation is available at the same only the signature will be visible.

loggingLevel.description: The verbosity level of Kite's logs.

developerMode.description: Enable Kite developer mode, displaying received data in the various UIs.
